description: This smoothie bowl recipe only takes 5 minutes to make – perfect for a quick breakfast. It’s packed with fruit and topped with crunchy, golden granola and coconut.
keywords: Smoothie bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Spring,Strawberry,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango
name: Granola & Mango Smoothie Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Sam's pantry honey oat bake with roasted almonds granola

recipeInstructions.text: Place mango and 1 banana in a blender and blend until smooth. Spoon into a bowl.
Spoon granola over half of the mango mixture to cover. Top with remaining banana, strawberry and coconut. Serve drizzled with syrup.
